title: QAPI Dashboard UI
description:
QAPI Dashboard - Quality Assurance Performance Improvement System

Build a comprehensive dashboard for tracking and visualizing Quality Assurance and Performance Improvement (QAPI) metrics, initiatives, and outcomes.

Requirements:

Core Features:
- Display key QAPI metrics with visual charts (trend lines, bar charts, pie charts)
- Track active quality improvement initiatives with status indicators
- Generate performance reports for specified time periods
- Provide drill-down capability from summary metrics to detailed data
- Support filtering by date range, department, initiative type, or metric category

Metrics Visualization:
- Real-time or near-real-time metric updates
- Configurable dashboard widgets that users can arrange
- Export charts and reports to PDF/Excel formats
- Color-coded indicators for metrics meeting/not meeting targets
- Historical trend analysis with comparison periods

Initiative Tracking:
- List view of all active and completed initiatives
- Progress tracking with milestones and completion percentages
- Assignment of owners and team members to initiatives
- Status workflow (planned, in-progress, completed, on-hold)
- Document attachments and notes for each initiative

Performance Reporting:
- Automated report generation on scheduled intervals
- Customizable report templates
- Key performance indicators (KPIs) with target vs. actual comparisons
- Summary dashboards for executive/leadership review
- Audit trail of changes and data updates

Technical Considerations:
- Define data sources and integration points
- Determine user roles and access permissions
- Establish performance benchmarks for dashboard load times
- Plan for scalability as data volume grows
- Consider mobile responsiveness for dashboard access
